2717.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|60|293$أَرْسَلْنَا|We sent|82|97|1342$رُسُلَنَا|Our Messengers|125|140|8071$تَتْرَا‌ۖ|(in) succession.|125|140|12292$كُلَّ مَا|Every time|90|105|4299$جَآءَ|came|57|72|4023$أُمَّةً|(to) a nation|105|112|1174$رَّسُولُهَا|its Messenger,|116|127|12293$كَذَّبُوهُ‌ۚ|they denied him,|130|152|12294$فَأَتْبَعْنَا|so We made (them) follow -|206|228|12295$بَعْضَهُم|some of them|110|132|2240$بَعْضًا|others,|75|86|2572$وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ|and We made them|148|157|8242$أَحَادِيثَ‌ۚ|narrations.|93|111|12296$فَبُعْدًا|So away|77|95|12290$لِّقَوْمٍ|with a people -|121|139|1100$لَّا|not|42|60|30$يُؤْمِنُونَ|they believe.|106|115|35$

2719.verse: إِلَىٰ|To|53|59|118$فِرْعَوْنَ|Firaun|93|105|2649$وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ|and his chiefs,|116|128|6651$فَٱسْتَكْبَرُواْ|but they behaved arrogantly|210|222|6751$وَكَانُواْ|and they were|116|128|615$قَوْمًا|a people|76|82|3073$عَالِينَ|haughty.|79|79|12297$

2720.verse: فَقَالُوٓاْ|Then they said,|124|130|4596$أَنُؤْمِنُ|"Shall we believe|131|144|113$لِبَشَرَيْنِ|(in) two men|105|118|12298$مِثْلِنَا|like ourselves|108|121|12299$وَقَوْمُهُمَا|while their people|136|149|12300$لَنَا|for us|58|64|338$عَـٰبِدُونَ|(are) slaves."|109|109|1251$

2721.verse: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا|So they denied them|158|180|12301$فَكَانُواْ|and they became|135|178|9833$مِنَ|of|50|93|156$ٱلْمُهْلَكِينَ|those who were destroyed.|202|224|12302$

2722.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|90|99|640$ءَاتَيْنَا|We gave|78|97|509$مُوسَى|Musa|83|102|499$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Scripture|107|126|451$لَعَلَّهُمْ|so that they may|135|154|1621$يَهْتَدُونَ|be guided.|89|98|4371$

2723.verse: وَجَعَلْنَا|And We made|111|118|4805$ٱبْنَ|(the) son|82|97|832$مَرْيَمَ|(of) Maryam|101|116|833$وَأُمَّهُۥٓ|and his mother|118|133|4833$ءَايَةً|a Sign,|66|81|2339$وَءَاوَيْنَـٰهُمَآ|and We sheltered them|174|181|12303$إِلَىٰ|to|53|94|118$رَبْوَةٍ|a high ground,|115|197|12304$ذَاتِ قَرَارٍ|of tranquility|118|200|12305$وَمَعِينٍ|and water springs.|143|184|12306$

2724.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ|O Messengers!|139|150|12307$كُلُواْ|Eat|61|83|539$مِنَ|of|50|72|156$ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ|the good things|124|146|6915$وَٱعْمَلُواْ|and do|99|121|12308$صَـٰلِحًا‌ۖ|righteous (deeds).|142|153|622$إِنِّى|Indeed, I Am|105|157|312$بِمَا|of what|71|175|43$تَعْمَلُونَ|you do|92|196|725$عَلِيمٌ|All-Knower.|95|147|307$

2726.verse: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ|But they cut off|127|136|12309$أَمْرَهُم|their affair (of unity)|157|176|9289$بَيْنَهُمْ|between them|115|134|1056$زُبُرًا‌ۖ|(into) sects,|103|122|12310$كُلُّ|each|52|71|575$حِزْبِۭ|faction|76|86|12311$بِمَا|in what|69|176|43$لَدَيْهِمْ|they have|87|300|2856$فَرِحُونَ|rejoicing.|93|200|7647$

2728.verse: أَيَحْسَبُونَ|Do they think|109|128|12313$أَنَّمَا|that what|86|125|3535$نُمِدُّهُم|We extend to them|148|187|12314$بِهِۦ|[with it]|74|113|204$مِن|of|50|89|53$مَّالٍ|wealth|64|83|12315$وَبَنِينَ|and children|100|100|10232$

2716.verse: No nation will precede its time [of termination], nor will they remain [thereafter].

2717.verse: Then We sent Our messengers in succession. Every time there came to a nation its messenger, they denied him, so We made them follow one another [to destruction], and We made them narrations. So away with a people who do not believe.

2718.verse: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority

2719.verse: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were arrogant and were a haughty people.

2720.verse: They said, "Should we believe two men like ourselves while their people are for us in servitude?"

2721.verse: So they denied them and were of those destroyed.

2722.verse: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they would be guided.

2723.verse: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign and sheltered them within a high ground having level [areas] and flowing water.

2724.verse: [Allah said], "O messengers, eat from the good foods and work righteousness. Indeed, I, of what you do, am Knowing.

2725.verse: And indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so fear Me."

2726.verse: But the people divided their religion among them into sects - each faction, in what it has, rejoicing.

2727.verse: So leave them in their confusion for a time.

2728.verse: Do they think that what We extend to them of wealth and children

2729.verse: Is [because] We hasten for them good things? Rather, they do not perceive.

2730.verse: Indeed, they who are apprehensive from fear of their Lord

2731.verse: And they who believe in the signs of their Lord

2732.verse: And they who do not associate anything with their Lord
